page.shortlink: api client api a5 u json preparse method

argument.name: object
argument.description: The object or array to parse.

page.description: Convert all data types (such as date and function) in passed in object that cannot be converted to a JSON string into special objects that can be converted back into there original type by using the *[link:A5.u.json.postparse]*.
page.example: var obj = {name: 'Bob', dob: new Date(1976,5,1)}; A5.u.json.preparse(obj);
